info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 04 at 10:23PM CDT until April 05 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1100 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN HUNT...HOPKINS...SOUTHERN LAMAR...DELTA AND SOUTHEASTERN FANNIN COUNTIES... At 1022 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Commerce, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...65 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Sulphur Springs, Commerce, Cooper, Cumby, Campbell, Deport, Cooper Lake Park South Sulphur, Cooper Lake Park Doctors Creek, Roxton, Ladonia, Tira, Pecan Gap and Neylandville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...65 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for north central Texas. For your protection stay inside a sturdy structure and keep away from windows. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately.
